participant_1.background:
I wish I could be myself with my family, but I'm afraid of what they'll think.
I usually wake up and play piano to clear my head before starting the day.
I like to spend time with my kids and watch them grow like my sunflowers.
i always eat my vegetables.
i like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items.

participant_2.background:
I'm a clumsy blonde, but my dog loves me anyway.
I'm not sure, but I can hear the difference between a C and a G.
I enjoy dressing up as my favorite characters from comic books and anime.
I wake up early and stretch before getting ready for my day.
i love the game halo.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just got back from a run. How about you?
I'm good. I'm getting ready to start my day.
Nice. What do you do for a living?
I work as a librarian.
Oh, that's cool. I've always loved to read.
Me too! I love to learn new things.
What's your favorite thing to read?
I like to read a lot of different things, but I especially love historical fiction.
That's a good genre. I like to read a lot of science fiction.
That's cool. I've never really gotten into science fiction, but I might try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I will. Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the movies, play video games, and hang out with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do a lot of the same things.
Cool. We should hang out sometime.
That would be fun. I'm free on Friday night.
Friday night sounds good. I'll text you my number.
